original_text:
Then the anger of the Lord was kindled against his people,
    and he abhorred his heritage;
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 자기 백성에게 맹렬히 노하시며 자기의 유업을 미워하사

sentences.original_text: Then the anger of the Lord was kindled against his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주의 진노가 그의 백성을 향해 타올랐고
